body.p: We the undersigned acquaintances neighbors and fellow County men of Joseph Short and John Harding would most respectfully state to his Excy Thos E. Bramlette Govr of Ky that we have long known said Short and Harding that they have always been men of honesty and integrity and we never know or heard of any charges against them that did violence to their good reputation until the charge made against them by one John. R. Redman= We therefore join with them in their prayer for pardon of the alleged crime of Robbery as prayed for by them in their Petition= Respectfully &c

Robert Thomas
I G Campbell
Dr. Wm L Turner
